item.title: silver pearl
item.description: February 21 / silver pearl (she/her) / 8:30-9:30PM ðŸ©· About silver pearl: silver pearl is a Bratislava-born DJ currently based in Amsterdam. Her genre-defying selections invite to explore the labyrinth of sound and our own complexities. Through deeply resonating basslines, her selections shine in myriad ways, just as pearls do.
